Reviews.Title: Samsung phone is good, however don't buy from OEM Shop
Reviews.Author: Code Chick
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for about 4 years now, and it has worked really well.  However, for some crazy reason, about 3 weeks ago it started redialing phone numbers over and over, staying stuck in phone records, and just being nuts!  So, I ordered a phone from OEM Shop thinking they were the same dealer I got the phone accessories from.  ***DO NOT US THIS SELLER***They sent me a phone with the charger flap split in two and the white square in the upper right corner on the inside of the battery compartment was gray or missing, meaning water or related damage.  When I let them know, they said they'd send me another one and for me pay for return shipping, so I filed a claim with Amazon.  I had to pay for return shipping (not reimbursed) for their defective phone.  So, since this phone can no longer be bought with cell phone companies, be very careful who you buy it from.  It's a good phone when it doesn't act crazy...which mine apparently fixed itself the next day, and now it's good...for now anyway....; )

Reviews.Title: Didnt want another contract extension
Reviews.Author: fromMNstateinturmoil
Reviews.Content: This is exactly as stated. it's a no frills phone. We didn't want to extend our contract with TMobile and this works well for us. would recommend

Reviews.Title: Great exact replacement!
Reviews.Author: Domenica A. Federico
Reviews.Content: This was a replacement for my wife. She does not like the newer smart phones that are big and clumpy and only uses it for calls and text. This was a perfect fit because she had the same one with T-Mobile and all I had to do was charge it, replace the sim card and that's it. The price was right and in todays market with most plans going to no contract and supplying your own phone, you will see more people buys phones for under $30 bucks rather than pay $600 for something that wont last a year!

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: Chantele Belamour
Reviews.Content: Phone worked great while i had it, ended up upgradimg so i sold it to a friend and thry have had it ever since.

Reviews.Title: Good buy
Reviews.Author: E. Downer "Fishywishy"
Reviews.Content: Ordered this for my driver, who admired mine (which is a discontinued model) and he likes it very much.  It wasn't as slim as mine, and I didn't like the bronze so much but he does!  He says it is user friendly with good clear reception.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied Customer
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I had this phone before I had the one I was currently using at the time, but once that died, I decided to go back to my old phone, the Samsung T-819.  This phone is great, and I was not disappointed at all.  It was everything I remember it to be.

ProductInfo.Features:
Slider style phone withquad-band GSM connectivity for global roaming--and ready for T-Mobile's 3G network
Compatible with T-Mobile's MyFaves service--unlimited calling to your five most called contacts
Bluetooth connectivity for both communication headsets and music headphones; MicroSD expansion and USB connectivity; 1.3-megapixel
Up to 5 hours of talk time, up to 300 hours (12.5 days) of standby time; measures 3.96 x 2.03 x 0.55 inches (HxWxD)
Included: Handset, battery, charger, SIM card, handsfree headset, user guide
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung T819 Quad-Band 3G Unlocked Cell Phone with 3MP Camera, Touchscreen, Email, Bluetooth, Expanded Memory US Version No Warranty (Bronze)
